LME1 represents 


```{r}
dataset <- filter(total_data2, condition == "SPF")
LME1 <- lmerTest::lmer(velocity ~ condition + status +  (1| subject), data = total_data2)
# coef(LME1)
summary(LME1)
```

```{r}

```

```{r}
predicted <- predict(LME1)
complete_indices <- complete.cases(total_data)
complete_data <- total_data[complete_indices,]

complete_data$predicted <- predicted

complete_data <- gather(complete_data, key = "valuetype", value = "value", c(5,7))
subject_data <- filter(complete_data, subject == "subject 17")
plot <- ggplot(subject_data, aes(x = time, y = value, color = valuetype)) + geom_line() + facet_wrap(vars(condition))
```
